Element.name: OutputPortDefinition
Element.Description:
An Output Port Definition is the exit point of the model defined by a Module Definition. Each Output Port Definition is referenced by a corresponding Output Port on the actual Module.

All parameters added to the definition are made available on the referencing Output Port and can be bound to external elements.

PropertyCategory.name: Appearance
PropertyCategory.Property: A distinctive icon displayed in the diagram and in the outline.
If checked, all parts belonging to this port definition will be displayed.
